channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 游댮 00:09 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates.
item.description: 游댮 00:09 Air alert in Cherkasy region. Follow for further updates. #Cherkasy_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter!
item.description: 游댮 22:17 Threat of artillery shelling! Artillery shelling is now in Chervonogrigorivska territorial community. Take shelter! #햖햣쒫쮏쫧쮏햦햡쮐햦쒬혧햨햟_혝햣햦혝쮐햦햟햩혧햫햟_햡쮏쨿썛얧 This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 游댮 21:59 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling. Go to shelter!
item.description: 游댮 21:59 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city of Nikopol and the Nikopol territorial community there is artillery shelling.
